item.description: I am an Assistant Professor in the Department of Mathematics, NUS. I got my PhD in Applied Mathematics from CMAP, Ecole Polytechnique. My thesis subject is Model Uncertainty in Finance and Second Order Backward Stochastic Differential Equations.
